import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import { ShopContext } from '../Context/ShopContext' import { assets } from '../Assets/frontend_assets/assets'; import Title from '../Components/Title'; const Collection = () => { const {products}=useContext(ShopContext); const[showFilter,setShowFilter]=useState(false); con return (
{/* Filter Option */}

setShowFilter(!showFilter)} className='my-2 text-xl flex items-center cursor-pointer gap-2'>FILTERS

{/* Category Filter */}

CATEGORIES

Men

Women

Kids

{/* Sub-Catagory Filter */}

TYPE

Topwear

Bottomwear

Winterwear

{/* Right Side */}
{/* Product Sort */} <select className='rounded-md border-2 border-gray-300 text-sm px-2'> <option value="relevant">Sort by: Relavent</option> <option value="low-high">Sort by: Low to High</option> <option value="high-low">Sort by: High to Low</option> </select> </div> {/* Map Products */} <div className='grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-4 gap-y-6'> </div> </div> </div> ) } export default Collection
